projects.title: Elementary Synchronous Motor Construction
projects.description: As part of the "Electrical Machines Principles" subject at the University, we decided to build up a prototype for a Synchronous Motor out of simple elements: a self-made coil, a pen's case, a recicled rare-earth magnet, metal and wood.

profile_positions.title: Manager of Operations
Sales Engineer
Sales Engineer
Applications Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Improve customer support quality by studying and re-designing processes, setting up and communicating service metrics, monitoring and evaluating results, and implementing changes.
• Coordination with UK, USA & Germany partners to support the LATAM region in product improvements, support documentation, and technical customer service.
• Assist customers with onboarding of the product or service, and also guide clients through installation, updating issues as needed.
• Combining technical expertise with customer service, inside sales activities, quotes preparation & commercial follow-up's.
• Digging to the root of problems, offering solutions, and support for product inspection equipment.
• Performing top-quality service, and at the same time enhancing the overall customer service process.

Technical Troubleshooting | Data Analysis | Customer Support Engineer | Product Improvements | Team Leader | Customer Focus | Sales Engineering | Customized Solutions | Metal Detectors | X-Ray Inspection | Checkweighing | Checkweighers
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Prepare product reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends.
• Evaluating electrical systems, testing of plugs, product components, applications by designing and conducting research programs. Applying knowledge of electricity and materials.
• Studying customer requirements, reducing costs, optimizing projects, and testing software for automated incoming goods inspection.
• Leading global projects with partners in Switzerland & China, ensuring product quality by designing electrical testing methods.
• Maintain product and company reputation by following the manufacturer's instructions and established procedures.
• Participating in training, maintaining product database by writing computer programs, and entering data.

SAP | Business Strategy | Electronics, Development of Applications | Labview | Instrumentation| Consistency Checking

volunteer_experiences.description:
Music Teaching Initiative "Música Entre Nós"​

Voluntary project aimed to teaching music in a comprehensive way to the local community next to the campus of UNESP Ilha Solteira.

The instruments teached are Acoustic Guitar and Keyboard.
